statements: SELECT * FROM Recycling_materials;
SELECT material_name, weight FROM Recycling_materials WHERE volume > 100;
SELECT material_name, volume FROM Recycling_materials ORDER BY volume DESC;
SELECT * FROM Recycling_materials WHERE material_id = 3;
SELECT material_name, weight, volume FROM Recycling_materials WHERE weight >= 10 AND volume <= 50;
SELECT * FROM Recycling_materials ORDER BY material_id DESC;
SELECT material_name, weight FROM Recycling_materials WHERE weight > 100 ORDER BY material_name ASC;
SELECT material_name, volume FROM Recycling_materials WHERE volume < 50 ORDER BY volume DESC;
SELECT material_name, weight, volume FROM Recycling_materials WHERE weight >= 50 AND volume >= 100 ORDER BY weight ASC, volume DESC;
SELECT material_name, weight + volume AS total_weight_volume FROM Recycling_materials WHERE material_id = 3 ORDER BY total_weight_volume DESC;
SELECT * FROM recycling_materials WHERE material_id = 1
SELECT material_name, weight FROM recycling_materials ORDER BY weight DESC
SELECT * FROM recycling_companies WHERE company_name LIKE 'A%'
SELECT SUM(weight) AS total_weight FROM recycling_materials
SELECT company_name, contact_person FROM recycling_companies ORDER BY company_name
SELECT * FROM recycling_materials ORDER BY material_name DESC;
SELECT material_name, weight FROM recycling_materials WHERE weight > 100 ORDER BY weight DESC;
SELECT material_name, volume FROM recycling_materials WHERE volume < 50 ORDER BY volume ASC;
SELECT * FROM recycling_companies WHERE company_name LIKE '%A%' AND contact_person LIKE '%B%' ORDER BY company_name;
SELECT company_id, company_name, contact_person FROM recycling_companies WHERE company_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM RecyclingMaterials;
SELECT material_name, weight FROM RecyclingMaterials WHERE weight > 100;
SELECT company_name, location FROM RecyclingCompanies ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT RM.material_name, CR.collected_weight FROM RecyclingMaterials RM JOIN CollectionRecords CR ON RM.material_id = CR.material_id;
SELECT company_name, contact_person FROM RecyclingCompanies WHERE location LIKE '%California%';
SELECT * FROM RecyclingMaterials WHERE weight > 100 ORDER BY material_name DESC;
SELECT material_name, SUM(weight) AS total_weight FROM RecyclingMaterials GROUP BY material_name;
SELECT company_name, location FROM RecyclingCompanies WHERE location LIKE '%City';
SELECT * FROM CollectionRecords WHERE collected_weight BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY collection_date DESC;
SELECT material_name, AVG(volume) AS avg_volume FROM RecyclingMaterials GROUP BY material_name HAVING AVG(volume) > 50;
SELECT * FROM materials;
SELECT material_name, weight FROM materials WHERE weight > 10;
SELECT center_name, location FROM collection_centers ORDER BY center_name ASC;
SELECT material_name, volume FROM materials WHERE volume < 50 ORDER BY volume DESC;
SELECT company_name, contact_person, phone_number FROM recycling_companies;
SELECT * FROM materials WHERE weight > 100 ORDER BY material_name ASC
SELECT material_name, weight FROM materials WHERE volume < 50 ORDER BY weight DESC
SELECT c.center_name, co.company_name FROM collection_centers c JOIN recycling_companies co ON c.id = co.id
SELECT m.material_name, c.collection_date FROM collections c JOIN materials m ON c.material_id = m.id WHERE c.collection_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT r.company_name, r.contact_person, c.center_name FROM recycling_companies r JOIN collection_centers c ON r.id = c.id ORDER BY r.company_name
SELECT * FROM material_types;
SELECT material_name, weight FROM material_types WHERE weight > 10;
SELECT collection_id, center_id, material_id FROM collections ORDER BY collection_date DESC;
SELECT employee_name, position FROM employees WHERE hire_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT center_name, location, capacity FROM collection_centers WHERE capacity >= 1000 ORDER BY center_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM material_types WHERE material_id = 1;
SELECT material_name, weight FROM material_types ORDER BY weight DESC;
SELECT collection_id, collection_date, weight_collected FROM collections WHERE weight_collected > 100 AND volume_collected < 50;
SELECT center_name, location, contact_person FROM collection_centers WHERE capacity >= 5000 ORDER BY center_name ASC;
SELECT employee_name, hire_date, position FROM employees WHERE hire_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2020-12-31';
